Great game, however if new players don't purchase prime, before the game was free and was $15, then they are kinda screwed. There are many hackers in the free-to-play lobbies and can easily get onto another account, since it is free, and continue there hacking/cheating spree.

This is most peoples childhood game including mine and i have made good friendships the past few years on this game. the only downside i will ever have about this game is that is a free to play and is more open to hackers. be aware, but enjoy the game overall <3
